description: A non-human being; or a functional group of non-human beings; or an ecosystem of living beings that includes non-humans; but it has agency and receives and/or provides economic/ecological resources.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the ecological agent.

image.description: URI to an image relevant to the ecological agent.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the ecological agent.

classifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for categorization.

primaryLocation.description: Reference to a vf.geo.spatialThing record for the agent's main location.
